body.name: 3 Drawer Dresser, Wood Nightstand for Bedroom, Modern Closet Drawers Stackable Storage Cabinet for Entryway, Mini Dresser Drawer Chest for Hallway, Office, 23.6''W, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 20 hrs 23 mins
features: High-Quality Composite Board: The board is made of long lasting engineered wood, The interior is made from recycled and sustainable materials, ensuring stability while being environmentally friendly. Its surface is not only scratch-resistant but also remarkably easy to clean. We prioritize both quality and value to bring you exceptional spaces every time.

Stackable End Table: This small dresser for closet consists of 3 drawers and can also be freely stacked according to your use, turning it into a nightstand, chest of drawers, dresser, nursery chest, suitable anywhere in your home.

Drawer with Metal Slide Rail: The drawer adopts a smooth all-metal roller, which runs smoothly on the metal slide rail with a built-in safety block. It is easy to open and close. Drawer capacity: 3.5" H x 11.3" W x 20.5" L.
Easy to Assemble: We digitally number the sides of each board to make it easier to install, and the installation manual is included in the package. Product Size: 25.1” H x 13.4” W x 23.6” L.

Multifunction Dresser: This bedroom dressing table has a small size and large capacity. It adopts modern style design, clean lines, and simple and relaxed outline modeling, which can perfectly match any scene and is suitable for bedrooms, nurseries, corridors and offices.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Modern Style Furtble Versatility 3-Drawer Nightstand With a well-thought-out layout, it provides multiple storage options to cater to your needs. The spacious tabletop offers ample space to place a lamp, alarm clock, or your favorite book, ensuring that everything you need is easily accessible right by your side. Additionally, the lower shelf or drawer provides additional storage for keeping essentials such as reading glasses, a notebook, or even a small plant to add a touch of nature to your bedside.

Elegant & Practical Furtble Chests of Drawers The 3-drawer configuration offers ample storage space, allowing you to neatly organize and store your belongings. Whether you need a convenient spot for clothing, accessories, office supplies, or household essentials, this dresser has you covered.

Is assembly required for this 3 drawer dresser? Yes, assembly is required for this Chests of Drawers, but it comes with all the necessary hardware and instructions to assemble it quickly and easily. You can also refer to our product page for installation videos. Are the drawers easy to open? Each drawer has metal slides, which allow you to easily and effortlessly pull them open. Does it shake when placed on the ground? Our bedside table fits perfectly to the floor and is very stable when properly assembled and placed on a level surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor Quality & Hardware
reviews.reviewText: Upon opening the packaging, I noticed a lot of the pieces were dirty. It wasn’t a big deal, as I figured I could just wipe it down, but some of the marks would not come off and seemed to be permanently stained. I still went through with putting it together. The wood was really poor quality. The hardware was hard to assemble. Not all the hardware seemed to fit where it was supposed to, and the pre cut holes were not perfectly lined up. Even after finishing, the dresser seems to be slightly unaligned. Hoping I’m able to get some sort of refund, and not sure how to take this all apart and still have it be in decent condition to send back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdiness improves with glue.
reviews.reviewText: Sturdiness only improves with glue in the joints. This is true for all assembled products that use a 1/2 turn fastener to hold joints together. I recently ordered 3 different products from 3 different manufacturers. Each has been glued together and by using the 1/2 turn fastener as a joint clamp.This particular product went together very easy, looks nice and is now very sturdy. We have hardwood floors so I attached 1/4 inch thick felt pads to the frame bottom. This helps moving it on the floor without scratching.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to put together (took about 2 and a half hours). Its just the right size for additional storage. The only things is that the drawer depth is pretty shallow. It fit everything I was hoping it would but nothing more! I may buy a second one to put next to it if it fits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad quality dresser !
reviews.reviewText: I have experience buying furniture from different stores , high end or budget friendly … and this dresser is super overpriced for what you get . Drawers are small, poor support , it was dirty and one of the sides wood panels was detached from the original piece . I don't recommend buying this at all there are much better options for even a cheaper price !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to put together and didn’t take extremely long to do it. One thing I noticed though was there were no holes for the sliders to go into, luckily I had a power drill but if I didn’t I would’ve been irritated. Hopefully it was just my set of parts but have a drill just in case otherwise it’s still worth it and looks beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Read the reviews!
reviews.reviewText: I guess I didn’t read the reviews closely. The poor quality reviews are correct. I bought three of these to replace plastic sterilte drawers that I had in my closet for bras, underwear, etc. I had to very carefully hand screw every screw to avoid stripping the boards. Quite a few of the cam lock screws broke. However they seem to stay together ok nonetheless. One of the cabinets is 1/4 inch shorter than the other two so lining them up side by side didn’t work. Luckily I figured out a configuration so it doesn’t matter. And when lifting one just to adjust its placement, I heard wood crack. The drawers are tiny - they actually hold less than the sterilite drawers. All that said, they look far nicer than the sterilite storage and I needed to purge anyway. 3 stars for good looks. I suggest improving the metal bits, and making them 2 inches deeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars not worth the money
reviews.reviewText: ordered this from a storefront and was excited for the product to come in. upon opening, it was dirty and had scuffs of dirt. i did not mind as i could just easily wipe it down with a cloth. but as i was building it, you can tell the wood is cheaply made with paint that was chipped off, and a lot of the screws could not fit into the designated areas. overall, i had high hopes but was disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly, small footprint
reviews.reviewText: I put these together without much effort. They fit neatly under the spare bed for tidy storage that is easily accessed.
